title: Just one kid
brief_description: An autobiographical look at the life of a Jewish boy growing up in London during the 1930’s providing a nostalgic impression of the Jewish community in London’s East End at that time. Highlights cultural traditions, continuity and change and the social conditions in the 30’s.
